TopicTitle: Looking for a Tutor or Mentor for Blender / Unity /KSP

Articles.Content:
Hi i would like to start making some simple mods for personal use but am not real sure on where to start, I am mature age and have plenty of time I learn very slowly so I am looking  for someone who wouldnt mind being a Tutor and teaching me the in's and out's of the whole process. 

Please PM if your interested 

Regards,

VG
